com.headwire.testing.cq.pageobjects

Class BasePage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.headwire.testing.cq.pageobjects.BasePage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseAuthorPage, PublishPage60, SiteAdminPage60, WelcomePage60

    public class BasePage
extends java.lang.Object
    Base page used as parent class for other PageObjects to inherit from. Provides common functions that are used across different page types
    Author:
    Diran Samarjian
